#include <cstdlib> 
#include <cctype> 
#include <cstring> 
#include <cstdio> 
#include <cmath> 
#include <algorithm> 
#include <vector> 
#include <string> 
#include <iostream> 
#include <sstream> 
#include <map> 
#include <set> 
#include <queue> 
#include <stack> 
#include <fstream> 
#include <numeric> 
#include <iomanip> 
#include <bitset> 
#include <list> 
#include <stdexcept> 
#include <functional> 
#include <utility> 
#include <ctime> 
#define p(x) cout<<#x " = "<<x<< " "
#define pr(x) cout<<#x " "<<x<<endl
#define pb push_back

using namespace std;

typedef pair<int,char> pic;

bool comp( pic a, pic b)
{
     if(a.first > b.first)
      return true;
     else if (a.first < b.first)
      return false;
     else return 
       a.second<b.second;
}
char s[100002];
int main(void)
{
    scanf("%s",s);
    int l = strlen(s);
    char c;
    int t;
    int i=0;
    vector <pair<int,char> > v;
    while(i<l)
    {
      c=s[i];
      i++;
      t=1;
      
      while(i<l && s[i]==c)
      { i++; t++;}
      v.pb(make_pair(t,c));
      
    }
    sort(v.begin(),v.end(),comp);
    //for(int i=0;i<v.size();i++)
    // printf("%d %c \n",v[i].first,v[i].second);
     //cin>>l;
    printf("%c\n%d\n",v[0].second,v[0].first);
    return 0;
}
